pageContext.description: Ornament on faces omitted in this sketch. LFC,Fair condition - cuts in butt.
pageContext.associations: Part of a Bronze worker's hoard found with other implements and numerous pieces of unused bronze metal.,This association is exceedingly doubtful - L.F. Chitty
pageContext.publications: Kept with Guilsfield Hoard. But E.L. Barnwell, Arch Cam. 1864, 213 expressly stated there "no very early types" were found in the hoard: evidence weighed up by L.F. Chitty, Arch Camb, 1939, 225.,Mont. Coll. Vol. III, p. 438.,Arch. Camb. Vol. X 3rd S. p. 212,PW, Xo, 547
pageContext.collection: Private Collection,1926,Earl of Powis,Powis Castle,Welshpool,Now National Museum of Wales,31.62/1
pageContext.site: wales,powys,welshpool,pool quay,crowther's camp,? recent association with lba hoard
